name: Defain
content:
Sergeant Defain was a Human male shuttle pilot in the Twenty-first Starfighter Division of the resurgent Sith Empire during the Galactic War.
At the end of the Great Galactic War in 3653 BBY, Defain participated in the battle of Coruscant where he flew sorties in the Twenty-first Starfighter Division. He also participated in the battle of Ilum in 3640 BBY.
Later around 3638 BBY, he was stationed over Makeb where he awaited an Imperial strike team to take down to the planet. However, during the landing, the shuttle crash-landed and the pilot was killed in the crash, leaving the Imperial strike team to handle the mission with the assistance of Katha Niar.
